*** NOTE: DEVELOPER SUPPORT FOR THIS APP IS NO LONGER AVAILABLE ***

*** WINNER OF WEBOSNATION'S "Most Innovative webOS App of 2011" Award ****
*** TOP PICK ON WEBOSROUNDUP *** 
Glimpse is a Touchpad App designed to maximize your productivity by allowing you to perform multiple tasks simultaneously, using a unique (customizable) split-screen interface.

The App comes pre-loaded with some core mini-apps (also called widgets) which you can run on any of the split screens. For example, you could be viewing your tweets while streaming a youtube video, or taking a note while viewing the weather and listening to your podcast. The possibilities. are endless.

Currently, the following widgets are available: Twitter, RSS, Weather, Web, Youtube, Tasks, Notepad, Converter, Calculator, Stopwatch, Shortcuts, Doodle, Calendar, Google Reader, Pocket (formerly Read It Later), Stocks, Clock, Simple Note... and many more planned to be added in future updates

New in Glimpse 1.3.1
- Updated "Read It Later" to "Pocket"
